attributes.title: Reverend Jim Bob Thornton
attributes.review: Please my fellow AMERICANS be advised this is a scam!!! Once the app finally downloaded 🕥🕦🕧🕤🕣🕢🕖🕡🕙🕠🕛🕜🕝🕞🕟🕚🕘🕑🕒 I instantly started receiving calls from China 🇨🇳!! My email was hacked as well. Three days later and I’m still getting phone calls.  Stay blessed and pray for this country and our amazing leader.  🙏🏻🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸

attributes.title: Trump for prison 2020😳🤢
attributes.review: Well I’d like to start off by saying that when I download this app it took approximately 41 hours to download 🙈 I was expecting to ge greatest to a wonderus amazing thing but instead I was greated by a fat ugly 🤢🤮 monstrous orange ogre with a tupe then I was immediately greeted with distributing messages 😰 saying they know where I live and they were gonna make me listen to nba young boy and give me HERPES🤢 and that Donald trump himself was going to come to my house and do unspeakable things oh the horror 😨😨 Get this man out of office trump for prison  2020

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to try and get hotel reservations and all they said was to “make America great again” 🙄 and I said no I want hotel reservations and then they said no black people allowed because we aren’t welcome to America even though they brought us here 🤦🏾‍♀️

attributes.title: Delete it please.
attributes.review: This app was literally a waste of time, please do not download it.
